alert.note: Alert for Karnes; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 2:35PM CDT until May 15 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Cibolo Creek Near Falls City affecting Karnes County. San Antonio River Near Elmendorf affecting Wilson and Bexar Counties. San Antonio River near Floresville affecting Karnes and Wilson Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Texas... Medina River At Hwy 281 affecting Bexar County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River near Floresville. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to late Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Water exceeds the lowest banks along the San Antonio River At 27.0 feet, Floodwaters begin to impact lower portions of Floresville City Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 5.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon before cresting near 29.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage by late Monday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue San Antonio River Floresville 27.0 5.2 Sat 2 pm CDT 27.5 25.9 14.4 &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 330 PM CDT.
